title: South Korea's President Defends Martial Law Decree, Vows To Fight "Till End"
content: Defending his shock decision last week to declare martial law, South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol on Thursday lashed out at his political opponents as "anti-state forces".
summary: Defending his shock decision last week to declare martial law, South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol on Thursday lashed out at his political opponents as "anti-state forces".

title: Fingerprints, Shell Casings: Evidence Links Luigi Mangione To CEO's Murder
content: Days after 26-year-old Luigi Mangione was arrested for allegedly killing UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson in New York, investigators have found new evidence linking him to the murder.
summary: Days after 26-year-old Luigi Mangione was arrested for allegedly killing UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson in New York, investigators have found new evidence linking him to the murder.

title: Israel Destroys 80% Of Syrian Strategic Military Assets After Assad's Ouster
content: Since Bashar al-Assad's 24-year rule came to an end on Sunday, Israel, which borders Syria, has conducted hundreds of strikes in key Syrian cities, targeting key military and strategic installations.
summary: Since Bashar al-Assad's 24-year rule came to an end on Sunday, Israel, which borders Syria, has conducted hundreds of strikes in key Syrian cities, targeting key military and strategic installations.

title: Google's New Quantum Chip Sparks Talk of Parallel Universes
content: Googles Willow chip, a breakthrough in quantum computing, has reignited debates about parallel universes, as it performs tasks at speeds that challenge traditional science.
summary: Googles Willow chip, a breakthrough in quantum computing, has reignited debates about parallel universes, as it performs tasks at speeds that challenge traditional science.

title: ChatGPT Sees Global Outage, OpenAI Says It Has Identified The Issue
content: Artificial Intelligence-powered chatbot ChatGPT has been experiencing global outage, preventing millions of users from accessing its services.
summary: Artificial Intelligence-powered chatbot ChatGPT has been experiencing global outage, preventing millions of users from accessing its services.

title: Elon Musk Becomes World's First Person With Over $400 Billion Net Worth
content: Elon Musk, whose wealth has been turbocharged since President-elect Donald Trump's win last month, became the first person to reach $400 billion in net worth, the latest milestone for the world's richest individual.
summary: Elon Musk, whose wealth has been turbocharged since President-elect Donald Trump's win last month, became the first person to reach $400 billion in net worth, the latest milestone for the world's richest individual.

title: Will "Guarantee" All Religious Groups' Rights: New Syria PM
content: Syria's new prime minister said the Islamist-led alliance that ousted president Bashar al-Assad will guarantee minority rights, in an interview published on Wednesday, also calling on the millions who fled the war to return home.
summary: Syria's new prime minister said the Islamist-led alliance that ousted president Bashar al-Assad will guarantee minority rights, in an interview published on Wednesday, also calling on the millions who fled the war to return home.

title: Luigi Mangione Was Charged With Murder - Then Donations Started Pouring In
content: In the days since Luigi Mangione was charged with murder for gunning down a top health insurance executive, more than a thousand donations have poured into an online fundraiser for his legal defense, with messages supporting him and even celebrating
summary: In the days since Luigi Mangione was charged with murder for gunning down a top health insurance executive, more than a thousand donations have poured into an online fundraiser for his legal defense, with messages supporting him and even celebrating

title: Nasdaq Rallies To 20,000 After US Inflation Data Matches Estimates
content: American and European stock markets mostly rose on Wednesday after inflation data cemented expectations that the US Federal Reserve will trim interest rates next month.
summary: American and European stock markets mostly rose on Wednesday after inflation data cemented expectations that the US Federal Reserve will trim interest rates next month.

title: Israel, Palestinians Explore Gaza Truce With Hostage Deal On Horizon
content: Although Biden and Trump are working separately, their efforts overlap and both stand to gain from a deal. A U.S. official said Trump's public statements about the need for a swift ceasefire "have not been harmful."
summary: Although Biden and Trump are working separately, their efforts overlap and both stand to gain from a deal. A U.S. official said Trump's public statements about the need for a swift ceasefire "have not been harmful."

title: Instagram Says Services Back Up After Outage Hits Thousands Globally
content: Meta-owned Instagram said its services were back online after thousands of users experienced technical issues accessing its platform on Wednesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.
summary: Meta-owned Instagram said its services were back online after thousands of users experienced technical issues accessing its platform on Wednesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.

title: FBI Director Chris Wray To Resign Before Trump Takes Office
content: FBI Director Chris Wray will step down from his post early next year, he said on Wednesday, after Republican President-elect Donald Trump signaled his intent to fire the veteran official and replace him with firebrand Kash Patel.
summary: FBI Director Chris Wray will step down from his post early next year, he said on Wednesday, after Republican President-elect Donald Trump signaled his intent to fire the veteran official and replace him with firebrand Kash Patel.

title: US President-Elect Donald Trump Is Time Magazine's "Person Of The Year"
content: Donald Trump will ring the opening bell of the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday on the same day he is expected to be named Time magazine's "Person of the Year", according to two people familiar with the selection and plans.
summary: Donald Trump will ring the opening bell of the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday on the same day he is expected to be named Time magazine's "Person of the Year", according to two people familiar with the selection and plans.

title: Trump Invites China's Xi Jinping To Attend Inauguration Next Month: Report
content: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has invited Chinese President Xi Jinping to attend his inauguration next month, CBS News reported on Wednesday, citing multiple sources.
summary: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has invited Chinese President Xi Jinping to attend his inauguration next month, CBS News reported on Wednesday, citing multiple sources.

title: New Syria PM Says Will "Guarantee" All Religious Groups' Rights
content: Syria's new prime minister said the Islamist-led alliance that ousted president Bashar al-Assad will guarantee minority rights, in an interview published on Wednesday, also calling on the millions who fled the war to return home.

title: US Announces First Israeli Withdrawal From Lebanon Under Ceasefire Deal
content: Israeli forces conducted a first withdrawal from a town in south Lebanon and were replaced by the Lebanese military under a ceasefire deal, the US Central Command (CENTCOM) said on Wednesday.
summary: Israeli forces conducted a first withdrawal from a town in south Lebanon and were replaced by the Lebanese military under a ceasefire deal, the US Central Command (CENTCOM) said on Wednesday.

title: S Jaishankar, UAE Counterpart To Hold Strategic Talks Today, Syria On Agenda
content: India and the UAE will look to further their already-strong strategic partnership to an all-time high when S Jaishankar and his counterpart Abdullah Bin Zayed Al Nahyan will meet in Delhi today for a comprehensive strategic dialogue.
summary: India and the UAE will look to further their already-strong strategic partnership to an all-time high when S Jaishankar and his counterpart Abdullah Bin Zayed Al Nahyan will meet in Delhi today for a comprehensive strategic dialogue.

title: Brazil's President Lula To Undergo Surgery To Reduce Cranial Bleeding Risk
content: Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva will undergo another operation Thursday to "minimize the risk of future bleeding" in an area under his skull that received emergency surgery this week, his doctor said.
summary: Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva will undergo another operation Thursday to "minimize the risk of future bleeding" in an area under his skull that received emergency surgery this week, his doctor said.

title: 32-Year-Old Indian Student Killed, 4 Injured In UK Road Accident
content: A 32-year-old Indian student has died in a road accident in eastern England's Leicestershire while four other people were hospitalised with serious injuries, according to police.
summary: A 32-year-old Indian student has died in a road accident in eastern England's Leicestershire while four other people were hospitalised with serious injuries, according to police.

title: Prehlad Iyengar, Suspended Over Palestine Essay, Appeals Against MIT Order
content: Prahlad Iyengar, also a National Science Foundation fellow, has been "suspended until January 2026". Iyengar is appealing his case with the Chancellor to "revoke or reduce" the "unjust sanctions" against him.
summary: Prahlad Iyengar, also a National Science Foundation fellow, has been "suspended until January 2026". Iyengar is appealing his case with the Chancellor to "revoke or reduce" the "unjust sanctions" against him.
